body.p: The set of Oxygen XML related products has grown over the years and it's useful to have a general overview of the product functionality we offer and what each of these products can do. I enjoyed the way in which George Bina's presentation Use-cases using the Oxygen XML tools at Convex Baltimore 2023 presented an overview of all our products and I'm embedding it below as it might be useful for our clients and integrators to also have a general overview of our products' ecosystem.
